name: Department subrogated to rights
text: §346-37.2  Department subrogated to rights.  The department shall be subrogated to the right of such child or children or person having the care, custody, and control of such child or children to the debt created under section 346-37.1.  Any judicial or administrative action to collect the debt for the department shall be undertaken by the child support enforcement agency under chapter 576D. [L 1975, c 137, pt of §1; am L 1986, c 332, §8]
